name: 页面管理

{"type":"page","title":"页面管理","body":[{"filterTogglable":false,"alwaysShowPagination":true,"pageField":"pageNo","perPageAvailable":[15,30,100,200],"syncLocation":false,"columns":[{"name":"pageId","label":"ID","type":"text"},{"name":"name","label":"页面名称","type":"text"},{"blank":true,"name":"pathLink","label":"地址路径","href":"http://${app.domain}${path}","type":"link","body":"${path}"},{"name":"type","label":"类型","type":"mapping","map":{"0":"amis","1":"HTML"}},{"name":"state","label":"状态","type":"mapping","map":{"0":"已停用","1":"正常"}},{"name":"updateTime","format":"YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm:ss","valueFormat":"x","label":"最近修改时间","type":"date"},{"buttons":[{"actionType":"link","level":"light","icon":"pull-left fa fa-edit","link":"/system/page/edit?appId=${app.appId}&pageId=${pageId}","label":"编辑","type":"button"},{"actionType":"dialog","dialog":{"type":"dialog","title":"页面访问控制 - 注意：该操作不可恢复！","label":"删除","api":"post:/system/api/page/delete?appId=${app.appId}&pageId=${pageId}","type":"button"}],"label":"操作","type":"operation"}],"primaryField":"pageId","hideQuickSaveBtn":true,"type":"crud","perPageField":"pageSize","perPage":15,"autoJumpToTopOnPagerChange":false,"draggable":false,"footerToolbar":[{"type":"columns-toggler","align":"right"}],"initFetch":true,"api":{"method":"get","url":"/system/api/page/list?appId=${appId}"},"headerToolbar":[{"actionType":"dialog","dialog":{"type":"dialog","title":"新建页面","body":{"controls":[{"name":"name","label":"页面名称","placeholder":"请输入页面名称","type":"text","required":true},{"name":"path","label":"地址路径","placeholder":"请输入地址路径","type":"text","required":true},{"selectFirst":true,"name":"type","options":[{"label":"amis","value":"0"},{"label":"HTML","value":"1"}],"label":"页面类型","type":"select","required":true}],"api":{"method":"post","dataType":"json","url":"/system/api/page/create?appId=${app.appId}"},"type":"form"}},"level":"primary","icon":"fa fa-plus pull-left","label":"新建","type":"button","align":"left"},{"tpl":" ${app.name}","type":"tpl"},{"type":"columns-toggler","align":"right"}]}]}
